power_1_high_entry_value.label: Power 1 High Entry Value
power_1_high_entry_value.description: Used to set the power value for Power 1 (the controlled load) that indicates entry into a Power 1 Low power state.

power_1_low_entry_value.label: Power 1 Low Entry Value
power_1_low_entry_value.description: Used to set the power value for Power 1 (the controlled load) that indicates exit from a Power 1 High state.

power_1_high_exit_value.label: Power 1 High Exit Value
power_1_high_exit_value.description: Used to set the power value for Power 1 (the controlled load) that indicates exit from a Power 1 High state.

power_1_low_exit_value.label: Power 1 Low Exit Value
power_1_low_exit_value.description: Used to set the power value for Power 1 (the controlled load) that indicates exit from a Power 1 Low power state.

power_1_high_delay.label: Power 1 High Delay
power_1_high_delay.description: Used to set the time duration that Power 1 High state change power level conditions must exist before Power 1 High state entry and/or exit is registered, and the associated actions are executed.

power_1_low_delay.label: Power 1 Low Delay
power_1_low_delay.description: Used to set the time duration that Power 1 Low state change power level condition must exist before Power 1 Low state entry and/or exit is registered, and the associated actions are executed.

power_1_periodic_report.label: Power 1 Periodic Report
power_1_periodic_report.description: Used to set the time in seconds between sending Power 1 METER REPORTs to the Lifeline.

power_1_change_report.label: Power 1 Change Report
power_1_change_report.description: Used to set the power in Watts that a reported reading of Power 1 must change by since the last reported value before a new METER REPORT is sent to the Lifeline.

power_1_renotification_delay.label: Power 1 Renotification Delay
power_1_renotification_delay.description: Used to set the time in seconds between sending repeated Power 1 METER REPORTs to the Lifeline while in a Power 1 Low or High state.

power_1_high_entry_set_value.label: Power 1 High Entry SET value
power_1_high_entry_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on entry into Power 1 High state.

power_1_high_exit_set_value.label: Power 1 High Exit SET value
power_1_high_exit_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on exit from Power 1 High state.

power_1_low_entry_set_value.label: Power 1 Low Entry SET Value
power_1_low_entry_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on entry into Power 1 Low state.

power_1_low_exit_set_value.label: Power 1 Low Exit SET Value
power_1_low_exit_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on exit from Power 1 Low state.

power_1_high_actions_control_association.label: Power 1 High Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON ENTRY
power_1_high_actions_control_association.description: If set, send BASIC SET with “Power 1 High Entry SET Value” to “Power 1 High” association group on Power 1 High state entry.

power_1_high_actions_control_association.label: Power 1 High Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON EXIT
power_1_high_actions_control_association.description: If set, send BASIC SET with “Power 1 High Exit SET Value” to “Power 1 High” association group on Power 1 High state exit.

power_1_high_actions_control_host_on_ent.label: Power 1 High Actions: CONTROL HOST ON ENTRY
power_1_high_actions_control_host_on_ent.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with “Power 1 High Entry SET Value” on host device on Power 1 High state entry.

power_1_high_actions_control_host_on_exi.label: Power 1 High Actions: CONTROL HOST ON EXIT
power_1_high_actions_control_host_on_exi.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with “Power 1 High Exit SET Value” on host device on Power 1 High state exit.

power_1_high_actions_report_transitions.label: Power 1 High Actions: REPORT TRANSITIONS
power_1_high_actions_report_transitions.description: If set, send METER REPORT to Lifeline on Power 1 High state entry and exit.

power_1_high_actions_apply_entry_delay.label: Power 1 High Actions: APPLY ENTRY DELAY
power_1_high_actions_apply_entry_delay.description: If set, apply “Power 1 High Delay” for Power 1 High state entry.

power_1_high_actions_apply_exit_delay.label: Power 1 High Actions: APPLY EXIT DELAY
power_1_high_actions_apply_exit_delay.description: If set, apply “Power 1 High Delay” for Power 1 High state exit.

power_1_low_actions_control_associations.label: Power 1 Low Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON ENTRY
power_1_low_actions_control_associations.description: If set, send BASIC SET with “Power 1 Low Entry SET Value” to “Power 1 Low” association group on Power 1 Low state entry.

power_1_low_actions_control_associations.label: Power 1 Low Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON EXIT
power_1_low_actions_control_associations.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with “Power 1 Low Entry SET Value” on host device on Power 1 Low state entry.

power_1_low_actions_control_host_on_entr.label: Power 1 Low Actions: CONTROL HOST ON ENTRY
power_1_low_actions_control_host_on_entr.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with “Power 1 Low Entry SET Value” on host device on Power 1 Low state entry.

power_1_low_actions_control_host_on_exit.label: Power 1 High Actions: CONTROL HOST ON EXIT
power_1_low_actions_control_host_on_exit.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with “Power Low Exit SET Value” on host device on Power 1 Low state exit.

power_1_low_actions_report_transitions.label: Power 1 High Actions: REPORT TRANSITIONS
power_1_low_actions_report_transitions.description: If set, send METER REPORT to Lifeline on low-power state entry and exit.

power_1_low_actions_apply_entry_delay.label: Power 1 High Actions: APPLY ENTRY DELAY
power_1_low_actions_apply_entry_delay.description: If set, apply “Power 1 Low Delay” for Power 1 Low state entry.

power_1_low_actions_apply_exit_delay.label: Power 1 High Actions: APPLY EXIT DELAY
power_1_low_actions_apply_exit_delay.description: If set, apply “Power 1 Low Delay” for Power 1 Low state exit.

power_2_high_entry_value.label: Power 2 High Entry Value
power_2_high_entry_value.description: Used to set the power value for Power 2 that indicates entry into a Power 2 High state.

power_2_low_entry_value.label: Power 2 Low Entry Value
power_2_low_entry_value.description: Used to set the power value for Power 2 that indicates entry into a Power 2 Low power state.

power_2_high_exit_value.label: Power 2 High Exit Value
power_2_high_exit_value.description: Used to set the power value for Power 2 that indicates exit from a Power 2 High state.

power_2_low_exit_value.label: Power 2 Low Exit Value
power_2_low_exit_value.description: Used to set the power value for Power 2 that indicates exit from a Power 2 Low state.

power_2_high_delay.label: Power 2 High Delay
power_2_high_delay.description: Used to set the time duration that Power 2 High state change power level conditions must exist before Power 2 High state entry and/or exit is registered, and the associated actions are executed.

power_2_low_delay.label: Power 2 Low Delay
power_2_low_delay.description: Used to set the time duration that Power 2 Low state change power level conditions must exist before Power 2 Low state entry and/or exit is registered, and the associated actions are executed.

power_2_periodic_report.label: Power 2 Periodic Report
power_2_periodic_report.description: Used to set the time in seconds between sending Power 2 METER REPORTs to the Lifeline.

power_2_change_report.label: Power 2 Change Report
power_2_change_report.description: Used to set the power in Watts that a reported reading of Power 2 must change by since the last reported value before a new METER REPORT is sent to the Lifeline.

power_2_renotification_delay.label: Power 2 Renotification Delay
power_2_renotification_delay.description: Used to set the time in seconds between sending repeated Power 2 METER REPORTs to the Lifeline while in a Power 2 Low or High state.

power_2_high_entry_set_value.label: Power 2 High Entry SET value
power_2_high_entry_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on entry into Power 2 High state.

power_2_high_exit_set_value.label: Power 2 High Exit SET value
power_2_high_exit_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on exit from Power 2 High state.

power_2_low_entry_set_value.label: Power 2 Low Entry SET value
power_2_low_entry_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on entry into Power 2 Low state.

power_2_low_exit_set_value.label: Power 2 Low Exit SET Value
power_2_low_exit_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on exit from Power 2 Low state.

power_2_high_actions_control_association.label: Power 2 High Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON ENTRY
power_2_high_actions_control_association.description: If set, send BASIC SET with “Power 2 High Entry SET Value” to “Power 2 High” association group on Power 2 High state entry.

power_2_high_actions_control_association.label: Power 2 High Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON EXIT
power_2_high_actions_control_association.description: If set, send BASIC SET with “Power 2 High Exit SET Value” to “Power 2 High” association group on Power 2 High state exit.

power_2_high_actions_control_host_on_ent.label: Power 1 High Actions: CONTROL HOST ON ENTRY
power_2_high_actions_control_host_on_ent.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with “Power 2 High Entry SET Value” on host device on Power 2 High state entry.

power_2_high_actions_control_host_on_exi.label: Power 2 High Actions: CONTROL HOST ON EXIT
power_2_high_actions_control_host_on_exi.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with “Power 2 High Exit SET Value” on host device on Power 2 High state exit.

power_2_high_actions_report_transitions.label: Power 2 High Actions: REPORT TRANSITIONS
power_2_high_actions_report_transitions.description: If set, send METER REPORT to Lifeline on Power 2 High state entry and exit.

power_2_high_actions_apply_entry_delay.label: Power 1 High Actions: APPLY ENTRY DELAY
power_2_high_actions_apply_entry_delay.description: If set, apply “Power 2 High Delay” for Power 2 High state entry.

power_2_high_actions_apply_exit_delay.label: Power 2 High Actions: APPLY EXIT DELAY
power_2_high_actions_apply_exit_delay.description: If set, apply “Power 2 High Delay” for Power 2 High state exit.

power_2_low_actions_control_associations.label: Power 2 Low Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON ENTRY
power_2_low_actions_control_associations.description: If set, send BASIC SET with “Power 2Low Entry SET Value” to “Power 2 Low” association group on Power 2 Low state entry.

power_2_low_actions_control_associations.label: Power 2 Low Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON EXIT
power_2_low_actions_control_associations.description: If set, send BASIC SET with “Power 2 Low Exit SET Value” to “Power 2 Low” association group on Power 2 Low state exit.

power_2_low_actions_control_host_on_entr.label: Power 2 Low Actions: CONTROL HOST ON ENTRY
power_2_low_actions_control_host_on_entr.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with “Power 2 Low Entry SET Value” on host device on Power 2 Low state entry.

power_2_low_actions_control_host_on_exit.label: Power 2 High Actions: CONTROL HOST ON EXIT
power_2_low_actions_control_host_on_exit.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with “Power 2 Low Exit SET Value” on host device on Power 2 Low state exit.

power_2_low_actions_report_transitions.label: Power 2 High Actions: REPORT TRANSITIONS
power_2_low_actions_report_transitions.description: If set, send METER REPORT to Lifeline on Power 2 Low state entry and exit.

power_2_low_actions_apply_entry_delay.label: Power 2 High Actions: APPLY ENTRY DELAY
power_2_low_actions_apply_entry_delay.description: If set, apply “Power 2 Low Delay” for Power 2 Low state entry.

power_2_low_actions_apply_exit_delay.label: Power 2 High Actions: APPLY EXIT DELAY
power_2_low_actions_apply_exit_delay.description: If set, apply “Power 2 Low Delay” for Power 2 Low state exit.

motion_sensitivity_level.label: Motion Sensitivity Level
motion_sensitivity_level.description: Used to set the sensitivity of the motion detection system.

motion_renotification_delay.label: Motion Renotification Delay
motion_renotification_delay.description: Used to set the time in seconds between optionally resending NOTIFICATION REPORT

motion_reset_delay.label: Motion Reset Delay
motion_reset_delay.description: Used to set the time in seconds between optionally resending NOTIFICATION REPORT

motion_detected_entry_set_value.label: Motion Detected Entry SET Value
motion_detected_entry_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on entry into motion detected state (Occupied)

motion_detected_exit_set_value.label: Motion Detected Exit SET Value
motion_detected_exit_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on exit from motion detected state (Vacant)

motion_actions_control_associations_on_e.label: Motion Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON ENTRY
motion_actions_control_associations_on_e.description: If set, send BASIC SET with “Motion Detected Entry SET Value” to “Motion” association group on entry into motion detected state (Occupied)

motion_actions_control_associations_on_e.label: Motion Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON EXIT
motion_actions_control_associations_on_e.description: If set, send BASIC SET with “Motion Detected Exit SET Value” to “Motion” association group on exit from motion detected state (Vacant)

motion_actions_control_host_on_entry.label: Motion Actions: CONTROL HOST ON ENTRY
motion_actions_control_host_on_entry.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with “Motion Detected Entry SET Value” on host device on entry into motion detected state (Occupied)

motion_actions_control_host_on_exit.label: Motion Actions: CONTROL HOST ON EXIT
motion_actions_control_host_on_exit.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with “Motion Detected Exit SET Value” on host device on exit from motion detected state (Vacant).

motion_actions_report_transitions.label: Motion Actions: NOTIFY TRANSITIONS
motion_actions_report_transitions.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with “Motion Detected Exit SET Value” on host device on exit from motion detected state (Vacant).

air_quality_level_1_index.label: Air Quality Level 1 Index
air_quality_level_1_index.description: Used to set the index value representing the upper limit for the 'Clean' air state.

air_quality_level_2_index.label: Air Quality Level 2 Index
air_quality_level_2_index.description: Used to set the index value representing the upper limit for the 'Clean' air state.

air_quality_level_3_index.label: Air Quality Level 3 Index
air_quality_level_3_index.description: Used to set the index value representing the upper limit for the 'Moderately Polluted' air state.

air_quality_alert_level.label: Air Quality Alert Level
air_quality_alert_level.description: Used to set the air quality level that will trigger Air Quality Alert State actions

air_quality_alert_delay.label: Air Quality Alert Delay
air_quality_alert_delay.description: Delay after detection of a level change before acting on change of air quality state

air_quality_renotification_delay.label: Air Quality Renotification Delay
air_quality_renotification_delay.description: Used to set the time in seconds between optionally resending NOTIFICATION REPORT

air_quality_voc_periodic_report.label: Air Quality VOC Periodic Report
air_quality_voc_periodic_report.description: Used to set the time in seconds between sending a periodic “Volatile Organic Compound level” MULTILEVEL SENSOR REPORT to the Lifeline.

air_quality_co2_periodic_report.label: Air Quality CO2 Periodic Report
air_quality_co2_periodic_report.description: Used to set the time in seconds between sending a periodic 'Carbon Dioxide CO2-level' MULTILEVEL SENSOR REPORT to the Lifeline.

air_quality_alert_entry_set_value.label: Air Quality Alert Entry SET Value
air_quality_alert_entry_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on entry into air quality alert state.

air_quality_alert_exit_set_value.label: Air Quality Alert Exit SET Value
air_quality_alert_exit_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on exit from air quality alert state.

air_quality_actions_control_associations.label: Air Quality Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON ENTRY
air_quality_actions_control_associations.description: If set, send BASIC SET with 'Air Quality Alert Entry SET Value' to 'Air Quality' association group on entry into air quality alert state.

air_quality_actions_control_associations.label: Air Quality Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON EXIT
air_quality_actions_control_associations.description: If set, send BASIC SET with 'Air Quality Alert Exit SET Value' to 'Air Quality' association group on entry into air quality alert state.

air_quality_actions_control_host_on_entr.label: Air Quality Actions: CONTROL HOST ON ENTRY
air_quality_actions_control_host_on_entr.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with 'Air Quality Alert Entry SET Value' to 'Air Quality' association group on entry into air quality alert state.

air_quality_actions_host_on_exit.label: Air Quality Actions: CONTROL HOST ON EXIT
air_quality_actions_host_on_exit.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with 'Air Quality Alert Exit SET Value' to 'Air Quality' association group on entry into air quality alert state.

air_quality_actions_notify_transitions.label: TAir Quality Actions: NOTIFY TRANSITIONS
air_quality_actions_notify_transitions.description: If set, send NOTIFICATION REPORT (Home Health: VOC Level Status Event) to Lifeline with updated pollution level value on change of air quality state and during the renotification period while in air quality alert state (if enabled).

temperature_high_entry_level.label: Temperature High Entry Level
temperature_high_entry_level.description: Used to set the temperature value that indicates entry into a high/over temperature state.

temperature_low_entry_level.label: Temperature Low Entry Level
temperature_low_entry_level.description: Used to set the temperature value that indicates entry into a low/under temperature state.

temperature_high_exit_level.label: Temperature High Exit Level
temperature_high_exit_level.description: Used to set the temperature value that indicates exit from a high/over temperature state.

temperature_low_exit_level.label: Temperature Low Exit Level
temperature_low_exit_level.description: Used to set the temperature value that indicates exit from a low/under temperature or under-temperature state.

temperature_high_delay.label: Temperature High Delay
temperature_high_delay.description: Used to set the time duration that high-power state change conditions must exist before high state entry and/or exit is registered, and the associated actions are executed.

temperature_low_delay.label: Temperature Low Delay
temperature_low_delay.description: Used to set the time duration that low-power state change conditions must exist before low state entry and/or exit is registered, and the associated actions are executed.

temperature_periodic_report.label: Temperature Periodic Report
temperature_periodic_report.description: Used to set the time in seconds between sending a periodic MULTILEVEL SENSOR REPORT to the Lifeline

temperature_change_report.label: Temperature Change Report
temperature_change_report.description: Used to set the temperature in degrees that a reported reading must change by to trigger a new temperature MULTILEVEL SENSOR REPORT to the Lifeline

temperature_renotification_delay.label: Temperature Renotification Delay
temperature_renotification_delay.description: Used to set the time in seconds between sending repeated temperature MULTILEVEL SENSOR REPORT messages to the Lifeline while in a low/under or high/over temperature state. If set to 0 (disabled) then normal change and periodic reporting still apply

temperature_high_entry_set_value.label: Temperature High Entry SET Value
temperature_high_entry_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on entry into high/over-temperature state

temperature_high_exit_set_value.label: Temperature High Exit SET Value
temperature_high_exit_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on exit from high/over-temperature state

temperature_low_entry_set_value.label: Temperature Low Entry SET Value
temperature_low_entry_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on entry into low/under temperature state

temperature_low_exit_set_value.label: Temperature Low Exit SET Value
temperature_low_exit_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on exit from low/under temperature state

temperature_high_actions_control_associa.label: Temperature High Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON ENTRY
temperature_high_actions_control_associa.description: If set, send BASIC SET with 'Temperature High Entry SET Value' to 'Temperature High' association group on high/over temperature state entry

temperature_high_actions_control_associa.label: Temperature High Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON EXIT
temperature_high_actions_control_associa.description: If set, send BASIC SET with 'Temperature High Exit SET Value' to 'Temperature High' association group on high/over temperature state exit

temperature_high_actions_control_host_on.label: Temperature High Actions: CONTROL HOST ON ENTRY
temperature_high_actions_control_host_on.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with 'Temperature High Entry SET Value' on host device on high/over temperature state entry

temperature_high_actions_control_host_on.label: Temperature High Actions: CONTROL HOST ON EXIT
temperature_high_actions_control_host_on.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with 'Temperature High Exit SET Value' on host device on high/over temperature state exit.

temperature_high_actions_report_transiti.label: Temperature High Actions: REPORT TRANSITIONS
temperature_high_actions_report_transiti.description: If set, send temperature MULTILEVEL SENSOR REPORT to Lifeline on high/over temperature state entry and exit

temperature_high_actions_notify_transiti.label: Temperature High Actions: NOTIFY TRANSITIONS
temperature_high_actions_notify_transiti.description: If set, send NOTIFICATION REPORT to Lifeline on high/over temperature state entry (Heat Alarm: Overheat), high/over temperature state exit (Heat Alarm: Idle), and during the Renotification Period (if enabled)

temperature_high_actions_apply_entry_del.label: Temperature High Actions: APPLY ENTRY DELAY
temperature_high_actions_apply_entry_del.description: If set, apply Temperature High Delay for high/over temperature entry

temperature_high_actions_apply_exit_dela.label: Temperature High Actions: APPLY EXIT DELAY
temperature_high_actions_apply_exit_dela.description: If set, apply Temperature High Delay for high/over temperature exit

temperature_low_actions_control_associat.label: Temperature Low Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON ENTRY
temperature_low_actions_control_associat.description: If set, send BASIC SET with 'Temperature Low Entry SET Value' to 'Temperature Low' association group on low/under temperature state entry

temperature_low_actions_control_associat.label: Temperature Low Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON EXIT
temperature_low_actions_control_associat.description: If set, send BASIC SET with 'Temperature Low Exit SET Value' to 'Temperature Low' association group on low/under temperature state exit

temperature_low_actions_control_host_on_.label: Power 2 Low Actions: CONTROL HOST ON ENTRY
temperature_low_actions_control_host_on_.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with 'Temperature Low Entry SET Value' on host device on low/under temperature state entry

temperature_low_actions_control_host_on_.label: Power 2 Low Actions: CONTROL HOST ON EXIT
temperature_low_actions_control_host_on_.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with 'Temperature Low Exit SET Value' on host device on low/under temperature state exit

temperature_low_actions_report_transitio.label: Power 2 Low Actions: REPORT TRANSITIONS
temperature_low_actions_report_transitio.description: If set, send Temperature MULTILEVEL SENSOR REPORT to Lifeline on high/over temperature state entry and exit

temperature_low_actions_notify_transitio.label: Power 2 Low Actions: NOTIFY TRANSITIONS
temperature_low_actions_notify_transitio.description: If set, send NOTIFICATION REPORT to Lifeline on low/under temperature state entry (Heat Alarm: Underheat), low/under temperature state exit (Heat Alarm: Idle), and during the Renotification Period (if enabled)

temperature_low_actions_apply_entry_dela.label: Temperature Low Actions: APPLY ENTRY DELAY
temperature_low_actions_apply_entry_dela.description: If set, apply Temperature Low Delay for high/over temperature entry

temperature_low_actions_apply_exit_delay.label: Temperature Low Actions: APPLY EXIT DELAY
temperature_low_actions_apply_exit_delay.description: If set, apply Temperature Low Delay for high/over temperature exit

pressure_high_entry_level.label: Pressure High Entry Level
pressure_high_entry_level.description: Used to set the pressure value that indicates entry into a high/over pressure state.

pressure_low_entry_level.label: Pressure Low Exit Level
pressure_low_entry_level.description: Used to set the pressure value that indicates entry into a low/under pressure state.

pressure_high_exit_level.label: Pressure High Exit Level
pressure_high_exit_level.description: Used to set the pressure value that indicates exit from a high/over pressure state.

pressure_low_exit_level.label: Pressure Low Exit Level
pressure_low_exit_level.description: Used to set the pressure value that indicates exit from a low/under pressure or under-pressure state.

pressure_high_delay.label: Pressure High Delay
pressure_high_delay.description: Used to set the time duration that high/over pressure state change conditions must exist before high state entry and/or exit is registered, and the associated actions are executed.

pressure_low_delay.label: Pressure Low Delay
pressure_low_delay.description: Used to set the time duration that low/under pressure state change conditions must exist before low state entry and/or exit is registered, and the associated actions are executed

pressure_periodic_report.label: Pressure Periodic Report
pressure_periodic_report.description: Used to set the time in seconds between sending a periodic MULTILEVEL SENSOR REPORT to the Lifeline

pressure_change_report.label: Pressure Change Report
pressure_change_report.description: Used to set the pressure in degrees that a reported reading must change by to trigger a new pressure Multilevel Sensor Report to the Lifeline

pressure_renotification_delay.label: Pressure Renotification Delay
pressure_renotification_delay.description: Used to set the time in seconds between sending repeated pressure Multilevel Sensor Report messages to the Lifeline while in a low/under or high/over pressure state. If set to 0 (disabled) then normal change and periodic reporting still apply.

pressure_high_entry_set_value.label: Pressure High Entry SET value
pressure_high_entry_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on entry into high/over-pressure state.

pressure_high_exit_set_value.label: Pressure High Exit SET value
pressure_high_exit_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on exit from high/over-pressure state

pressure_low_entry_set_value.label: Pressure Low Entry SET value
pressure_low_entry_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on exit from low/under pressure state.

pressure_low_exit_set_value.label: Pressure Low Exit SET value
pressure_low_exit_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on exit from low/under pressure state.

pressure_high_actions_control_associatio.label: Pressure High Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON ENTRY
pressure_high_actions_control_associatio.description: If set, send BASIC SET with 'Pressure High Entry SET Value' to 'Pressure High' association group on high/over pressure state entry

pressure_high_actions_control_associatio.label: Pressure High Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON EXIT
pressure_high_actions_control_associatio.description: If set, send BASIC SET with 'Pressure High Exit SET Value' to 'Pressure High' association group on high/over pressure state exit

pressure_high-actions_control_host_on_en.label: Pressure High Actions: CONTROL HOST ON ENTRY
pressure_high-actions_control_host_on_en.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with 'Pressure High Entry SET Value' on host device on high/over pressure state entry

pressure_high_actions_control_host_on_ex.label: Pressure High Actions: CONTROL HOST ON EXIT
pressure_high_actions_control_host_on_ex.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with 'Pressure High Exit SET Value' on host device on high/over pressure state exit.

pressure_high_actions_report_transitions.label: Pressure High Actions: REPORT TRANSITIONS
pressure_high_actions_report_transitions.description: If set, send pressure MULTILEVEL SENSOR REPORT to Lifeline on high/over pressure state entry and exit

pressure_high-actions_apply_entry_delay.label: Pressure High Actions: APPLY ENTRY DELAY
pressure_high-actions_apply_entry_delay.description: If set, apply Pressure High Delay for high/over pressure entry

pressure_high_actions_apply_exit_delay.label: Pressure High Actions: APPLY EXIT DELAY
pressure_high_actions_apply_exit_delay.description: If set, apply Pressure High Delay for high/over pressure exit

pressure_low_actions_control_association.label: Pressure Low Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON ENTRY
pressure_low_actions_control_association.description: If set, send BASIC SET with 'Pressure Low Exit SET Value' to 'Pressure Low' association group on low/under pressure state entry

pressure_low_actions_control_association.label: Pressure Low Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON EXIT
pressure_low_actions_control_association.description: If set, send BASIC SET with 'Pressure Low Exit SET Value' to 'Pressure Low' association group on low/under pressure state exit

pressure_low_actions_control_host_on_ent.label: Pressure Low Actions: CONTROL HOST ON ENTRY
pressure_low_actions_control_host_on_ent.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with 'Pressure Low Entry SET Value' on host device on low/under pressure state entry

pressure_low_actions_control_host_on_exi.label: Pressure Low Actions: CONTROL HOST ON EXIT
pressure_low_actions_control_host_on_exi.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with 'Pressure Low Exit SET Value' on host device on low/under pressure state exit.

pressure_low_actions_report_transitions.label: Pressure Low Actions: REPORT TRANSITIONS
pressure_low_actions_report_transitions.description: If set, send pressure MULTILEVEL SENSOR REPORT to Lifeline on high/over pressure state entry and exit

pressure_low_actions_apply_entry_delay.label: Pressure Low Actions: APPLY ENTRY DELAY
pressure_low_actions_apply_entry_delay.description: If set, apply Pressure Low Delay for low/under pressure state entry

pressure_low_actions_apply_exit_delay.label: Pressure Low Actions: APPLY EXIT DELAY
pressure_low_actions_apply_exit_delay.description: If set, apply Pressure Low Delay for low/under pressure state exit.

humidity_high_entry_level.label: Humidity High Entry Level
humidity_high_entry_level.description: Used to set the humidity value that indicates entry into a high/over humidity state.

humidity_low_entry_level.label: Humidity Low Exit Level
humidity_low_entry_level.description: Used to set the humidity value that indicates entry into a low/under humidity state.

humidity_high_exit_level.label: Humidity High Exit Level
humidity_high_exit_level.description: Used to set the humidity value that indicates exit from a high/over humidity state.

humidity_low_exit_level.label: Humidity Low Exit Level
humidity_low_exit_level.description: Used to set the humidity value that indicates exit from a low/under humidity or under-humidity state.

humidity_high_delay.label: Humidity High Delay
humidity_high_delay.description: Used to set the time duration that high/over humidity state change conditions must exist before high state entry and/or exit is registered, and the associated actions are executed.

humidity_low_delay.label: Humidity Low Delay
humidity_low_delay.description: Used to set the time duration that low/under humidity state change conditions must exist before low state entry and/or exit is registered, and the associated actions are executed

humidity_periodic_report.label: Humidity Periodic Report
humidity_periodic_report.description: Used to set the time in seconds between sending a periodic MULTILEVEL SENSOR REPORT to the Lifeline

humidity_change_report.label: Humidity Change Report
humidity_change_report.description: Used to set the humidity in degrees that a reported reading must change by to trigger a new humidity Multilevel Sensor Report to the Lifeline

humidity_renotification_delay.label: Humidity Renotification Delay
humidity_renotification_delay.description: Used to set the time in seconds between sending repeated humidity Multilevel Sensor Report messages to the Lifeline while in a low/under or high/over humidity state. If set to 0 (disabled) then normal change and periodic reporting still apply.

humidity_high_entry_set_value.label: Humidity High Entry SET value
humidity_high_entry_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on entry into high/over-humidity state.

humidity_high_exit_set_value.label: Humidity High Exit SET value
humidity_high_exit_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on exit from high/over-humidity state

humidity_low_entry_set_value.label: Humidity Low Entry SET value
humidity_low_entry_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on exit from low/under humidity state.

humidity_low_exit_set_value.label: Humidity Low Exit SET value
humidity_low_exit_set_value.description: BASIC SET value sent to associated nodes on exit from low/under humidity state.

humidity_high_actions_control_associatio.label: Humidity High Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON ENTRY
humidity_high_actions_control_associatio.description: If set, send BASIC SET with 'Humidity High Entry SET Value' to 'Humidity High' association group on high/over humidity state entry

humidity_high_actions_control_associatio.label: Humidity High Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON EXIT
humidity_high_actions_control_associatio.description: If set, send BASIC SET with 'Humidity High Exit SET Value' to 'Humidity High' association group on high/over humidity state exit

humidity_high-actions_control_host_on_en.label: Humidity High Actions: CONTROL HOST ON ENTRY
humidity_high-actions_control_host_on_en.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with 'Humidity High Entry SET Value' on host device on high/over humidity state entry

humidity_high_actions_control_host_on_ex.label: Humidity High Actions: CONTROL HOST ON EXIT
humidity_high_actions_control_host_on_ex.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with 'Humidity High Exit SET Value' on host device on high/over humidity state exit.

humidity_high_actions_report_transitions.label: Humidity High Actions: REPORT TRANSITIONS
humidity_high_actions_report_transitions.description: If set, send humidity MULTILEVEL SENSOR REPORT to Lifeline on high/over humidity state entry and exit

humidity_high-actions_apply_entry_delay.label: Humidity High Actions: APPLY ENTRY DELAY
humidity_high-actions_apply_entry_delay.description: If set, apply Humidity High Delay for high/over humidity entry

humidity_high_actions_apply_exit_delay.label: Humidity High Actions: APPLY EXIT DELAY
humidity_high_actions_apply_exit_delay.description: If set, apply Humidity High Delay for high/over humidity exit

humidity_high_actions_baseline_mode.label: Humidity High Actions: BASELINE MODE
humidity_high_actions_baseline_mode.description: If set, use humidity averaging for high/over humidity range checks

humidity_low_actions_control_association.label: Humidity Low Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON ENTRY
humidity_low_actions_control_association.description: If set, send BASIC SET with 'Humidity Low Exit SET Value' to 'Humidity Low' association group on low/under humidity state entry

humidity_low_actions_control_association.label: Humidity Low Actions: CONTROL ASSOCIATIONS ON EXIT
humidity_low_actions_control_association.description: If set, send BASIC SET with 'Humidity Low Exit SET Value' to 'Humidity Low' association group on low/under humidity state exit

humidity_low_actions_control_host_on_ent.label: Humidity Low Actions: CONTROL HOST ON ENTRY
humidity_low_actions_control_host_on_ent.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with 'Humidity Low Entry SET Value' on host device on low/under humidity state entry

humidity_low_actions_control_host_on_exi.label: Humidity Low Actions: CONTROL HOST ON EXIT
humidity_low_actions_control_host_on_exi.description: If set, execute BASIC SET with 'Humidity Low Exit SET Value' on host device on low/under humidity state exit.

humidity_low_actions_report_transitions.label: Humidity Low Actions: REPORT TRANSITIONS
humidity_low_actions_report_transitions.description: If set, send humidity MULTILEVEL SENSOR REPORT to Lifeline on high/over humidity state entry and exit

humidity_low_actions_apply_entry_delay.label: Humidity Low Actions: APPLY ENTRY DELAY
humidity_low_actions_apply_entry_delay.description: If set, apply Humidity Low Delay for low/under humidity state entry

humidity_low_actions_apply_exit_delay.label: Humidity Low Actions: APPLY EXIT DELAY
humidity_low_actions_apply_exit_delay.description: If set, apply Humidity Low Delay for low/under humidity state exit.

humidity_low_actions_baseline_mode.label: Humidity Low Actions: BASELINE MODE
humidity_low_actions_baseline_mode.description: If set, use humidity averaging for low/over humidity range checks

system_status.label: System Status
system_status.description: Used to provide status information for system troubleshooting.

system_led_brightness.label: System LED Brightness
system_led_brightness.description: Used to set the power output to the system LED to control on brightness level.

options.label: LED follows state of host switch
LED is inverse of state of host switch

switch_host_control_flags_on_off_invert.label: Switch Host Control Flags: On/Off Invert

options.label: host output is reported on when energized, off when de-energized. Commands to host are not inverted.
host output is reported off when energized, on when de-energized. Commands to host are inverted to match.

dimmer_minimum_brightness.label: Dimmer Minimum Brightness
dimmer_minimum_brightness.description: Used to set the minimum power output to the dimmer on the lowest setting above ‘off’.

dimmer_maximum_brightness.label: Dimmer Maximum Brightness
dimmer_maximum_brightness.description: Used to set the maximum power output to the dimmer on the highest ‘on’ setting.

dimmer_default_brightness.label: Dimmer Default Brightness
dimmer_default_brightness.description: Used to set the power output to the dimmer when it is initially turned on by the manual switch.
